#text=Yesterday I rode the bus to school .
#text=The bus I get is the number 24 .
#text=It costs 60 cent when I am in my school uniform .
#text=I asked my parents for 60 cent and they gave it to me .
#text=I then made my way to the bus stop .
#text=The bus stop is about a 10 minute walk from my house .
#text=On my way to the bus stop I counted the money my parents gave me .
#text=When I got to the bus stop I waited for five minutes and then the bus arrived .
#text=The bus doors opened and I got on the bus .
#text=I said hello to the bus driver and told him where I wanted to go .
#text=I then put the 60 cent on the counter .
#text=The bus man took the money and gave me a ticket .
#text=I took the ticket from him and walked towards the seats .
#text=I sat near the front beside my friend Laura .
#text=She gets the bus with me every day .
#text=I put my schoolbag on the ground .
#text=We talked about what we had done the night before .
#text=The journey to school lasts about 15 minutes .
#text=After 15 minutes I heard the name of my destination being announced .
#text=I picked my bag up off the ground and walked towards the exit doors .
#text=I thanked the bus driver as I got off the bus .
